column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing an amino acid structure with an aromatic side chain
column2: Rule 2: Modifiers with a benzoic acid core and additional strong electron-withdrawing groups
column3: Rule 3: Modifiers with a hydroxyl group on an aromatic ring, especially in a para position
column4: Rule 4: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups in a sugar-like structure
column6: Rule 6: Modifiers with a pyridine ring and hydroxyl groups in specific positions
column7: Rule 7: Modifiers with fluorinated alkyl chains
column8: Rule 8: Modifiers with a formyl group attached to an aromatic ring
column9: Rule 9: Modifiers with ether linkages in a non-aromatic context
column10: Rule 10: Modifiers with an acetamido group in an aliphatic context
column11: Rule 11: Modifiers with a methoxy group on an aromatic ring
column12: Rule 12: Modifiers with a carboxylic acid group attached to a short aliphatic chain
column13: Rule 13: Modifiers with a carboxylic acid group attached to a non-aromatic, long aliphatic chain
column14: Rule 14: Modifiers with a formyl group attached to a phenolic structure
column15: Rule 15: Modifiers with a pyridine ring and additional electron-withdrawing groups
